title: The Turnovers = Las Empanadas [Destinos Pt 2: Ep 46]
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Foreign language films
description: Episode number 46 of Series "Destinos: an introduction to Spanish. Pt. 2". Episode 46: Angela and Roberto are still discussing the apartment. Arturo meets Raquel's father and gets to know him better. Raquel and her mother attempt to reconcile after their argument, and Raquel makes it clear to her mother that she sees Luis as part of the past and Arturo as the future. Arturo, Raquel and her parents spend the day sightseeing. Juan has returned home to see his father return from the hospital.
related_objects: Series; S01216; Destinos: an introduction to Spanish. Pt. 2; Active; 1992
